website_summaries.verdict: Really a beautiful set of black duck decoys. They look very real.
pros: Keel design creates a natural motion on the water
Comes in a set of 6 with ducks in 3 different head positions
These are among the most realistic set of decoys on the market
cons: They look so real you might have a hard time telling your decoy from the real ducks

customer_reviews.title: Great looking birds
customer_reviews.text: Great looking birds! Notches on keel do the job nicely though I would prefer a g&h style bump for half hitching line. Not certain they draw more birds as we got them at the end of this last season but I'm completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Erik in Maryland

customer_reviews.title: High quality and  realism. !!!!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Look.!!! The. Avian x are the best decoys on the market for realism. Agreed , they are pricey by some stAndafrds ;however, in the long haul I believe you will be pleased. Have a good hunt.
customer_reviews.author: David McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decoys
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. Best black duck decoys I've ever owned! Black flocking on all 6 were flawless and look fantastic. Keel has line attachments front and back plus line placement "clips" front and middle. Haven't hunted w them so durability is unknown.
customer_reviews.author: John Rochester

customer_reviews.title: Nice but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: There could have been more detail in the flocking of the body and the head is not flocked at all. They are usable but I was expecting more from Avian.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty slick Fool weary late season birds. Pricey but look great!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love Avian X but keel cap was missing
customer_reviews.text: Typical Avian X product. I have yet to use them yet as I purchased them after the season was over but they are great looking decoys. The reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that one of the caps for keel is missing and I can't contact the company without returning the whole product when all I want is this one replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Must have for tidal waterfowl
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great flocking. These birds really do look real. If one lands in your decoys, good luck picking the real out from the fake.
customer_reviews.author: Fowltails

customer_reviews.title: 5 star decoy
customer_reviews.text: these decoys are the best i own, havent used in the field yet, but based on looks alone and quality it seems to be, they are like none other
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Siehr

customer_reviews.title: best decoys...period
customer_reviews.text: great size! super realistic! can't wait to get them in the water!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Sehon

customer_reviews.title: Order these, when I received them opened them up ...
customer_reviews.text: Order these, when I received them opened them up and there was hardcore brand mallards in there. Not sure how that happens. Very very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hurley

product_meta.title: AvianX Top Flight Flocked Duck Floater Decoy (6 Pack), Black
product_meta.description: Top Flight Flocked Black Duck Decoy. Ultra-realistic flocking and paint schemes combine with the ultimate in coating adhesion and durability to create what many are saying is the final word in floating black duck decoys. All Topflight decoys feature the innovation weight-forward swim keel design - simply snap the line through the swim clip, to create natural motion to the decoys whether in current or in the slightest breeze. Decoys are slightly oversized, measuring 14.5 inches, breast to tail. This pack includes three drakes (one high-head, one swimmer and one feeder), and three hens (one high-head, one swimmer and one feeder).
